reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress classy for weddings and appreciate its well-made construction, comfortable fit, and flattering cut. Moreover, the fabric receives positive feedback for its quality, with one customer noting it's not thin. However, customers disagree on the dress's wrinkle resistance, with some reporting it wrinkles easily. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this navy blue dress. Classy and a bit of sexy because of the lace.
items.body: Beautiful dress. The navy blue is perfect navy blue where it is not too dark or too bright. The material look and feels very good quality. Best of all is the lace where usually some laces are stiff and scratchy but this lace material was SO soft, stretchy, and comfortable. Fabric weight feels like good quality, not too heavy or thin. Would recommend! Excellent quality and seems more expensive than how much it cost. Length is perfect where it appropriate for weddings, retirement parties, or maybe even church. Lace is a bit sexy. Overall it gives the conservative and a bit sexy vibe. Read more
items.author: Lblush

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful for formal occasions.
items.body: Purchased for formal dinners. Beautiful red color for Christmastime. Only problem is it wrinkles easily. Definitely not wrinkle resistant. Tried to gently iron. The fit and length were perfect and good quality. I wish it was lined. Good value. Read more
items.author: MGreen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty cocktail dress, comfortable and flattering.
items.body: Very pretty dress. Very comfortable. Seems true to size. I love the lacy arm sleeves. I’m 5’4” and it stops just above my knees. I bought a small and could have fit into an extra small for a tighter fit. It’s a polyester material so it won’t shrink. Read more
items.author: Meri Shopper

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality. Would not recommend!
items.body: If there were a zero that is what I would give it. This item came with a HUGE hole/tear and the item looked like it has been run over. Dirty, wrinkled and as stated a huge hole/tear in the front of the dress. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: I can’t say enough good things about this dress. It was simple but elegant. It fit me perfectly for my wedding. It wasn’t see through at all. I loved the top part was soft lace. I tried many dresses and this was the last one I ordered and ended up wearing. I used a steamer on the dress and it came out perfectly. I bought it in several other colors. Read more
items.author: Beth L.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars The WRINKLES!
items.body: I wore this cute dress to an all black wedding. Fit great. True to size. Received many compliments. However it came shrink wrapped in a small baggy. The wrinkles were unbelievable. I let it hang for a few weeks. Still wrinkled. Sprayed lightly with water and Downey wrinkle release. Still wrinkled. Finally broke down and used an iron on a low setting. The wrinkles were less. Had to iron it two more times before it was wearable. Just keep this in mind. Especially if you don’t have an iron and ironing board. Read more
items.author: Connie Richardson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy it!
items.body: Loved the dress!! Fits great and looks amazing!!! Read more
items.author: Lesa Bhola

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent purchase
items.body: It was true to size and fit great! It was very comfortable and looked great. Excellent dress for the price. Read more
items.author: Dan

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Black Short Sleeve, Pink, Black Long Sleeve, Black Floral Long Sleeve, Wine Long Sleeve, Black, Navy Blue, White Long Sleeve, Navy Blue Long Sleeve, White Short Sleeve. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
